Hey everyone, just checking in to see if anyone has a solution to integrate adobe / typekit font(s) easily with the themes boilerplate? at this point in time, i’m a little too fresh with the new themes so any help would be highly appreciated :slightly_smiling_face:
You would add it to the base template or import to one of your css files as you normally would. At this time the font field does not support custom fonts aside from google fonts.
